bayes

Class BNNodeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes.BNNodeManager

  • public class BNNodeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the nodes and all node and edge operations in a Bayesian network such as adding/removing nodes and edges and updating the parameters in the model.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

    • Field Summary

      Verbose debug output

      • isValidEdge

        public java.lang.Boolean isValidEdge(BNNode parent,
                            BNNode child)
        Tests if a hypothetical edge between two nodes is valid. That is, whether this edge would create a cycle in the network. This method does not create the edge in the network.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent node
        child - the child node
        Returns:
        true if the edge is valid (i.e. no cycle). False otherwise

      • isValidReverseEdge

        public java.lang.Boolean isValidReverseEdge(BNNode parent,
                                   BNNode child)
        Determines if reversing the edge from (parent -> child) will result in a valid DAG. If the original edge (parent -> child) doesn't exists, then this method returns false.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent node
        child - the child node
        Returns:
        true if reversing the existing edge will not result in a cycle, false if the forward edge doesn't exist or reversing the edge causes a cycle

      • edgeExists

        public java.lang.Boolean edgeExists(BNNode parent,
                           BNNode child)
        Test if an edge exists in the network
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent node
        child - the child node
        Returns:
        true if the edge exists, false otherwise
